oai_dc:dc.dc:title: US model 1857 (aka 1860) light cavalry saber
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This US model 1857 (aka 1860) light cavalry saber was made by the Tiffany Company, which had contracts during the Civil War. The saber was found in a scrap pile in Sietta Vista, AZ near Ft. Hauchuca near Tombstone, AZ.; The model 1857 was used by the US Cavalry from the late 1850s until replaced by a new model in 1906.
